entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How about MemberNotNullWhenResultNotNullAttribute? #58291
  • UserFunctionException --> OperationCanceledException in SourceGeneration/Nodes/SyntaxReceiverInputNode.cs:line 81 #58290
  • Developers get guidance on best practices when writing C# or VB code #58289
  • The SDK 'Microsoft.NET.Sdk' specified could not be found. #58286

Closed

  • Proposal: provide trigger info to generators to enable more expensive workloads #51497
    17.1
  • Pattern matching: exhaustiveness check doesn't take null into account while nullable is disabled #58287

PullRequests

Created

  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Check operations when doing type name simplification #58285
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58292
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update instructions for building runtime repo #58172
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58284
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #58283
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58282
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #58281
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Fix stack exhaustion when parsing large regex alternating sequences. #58254
    Area-IDE
  • Add VSTypeScriptBlockStructure external access APIs #58252
    Area-IDE
  • Suggest parameter names from matching overloads #52801
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE
  • Record list-patterns and newlines in interpolations as done #58250
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix regression of LambdaSymbol.GetHashCode #58247
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
